tool_description:
Here at the AmericanFootballApi you can find all the results and live scores from the biggest and most popular American football league in the world - NFL and when regular NFL season is finished, follow live scores of NFL playoffs and Superbowl. In addition to NFL we will also provide you with the livescores, results, standings and schedules for the NCAA College American football and Canadian CFL.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/alls...
name: AmericanFootballApi
title: AmericanFootballApi

api_list.name: ManagerImage
api_list.description: Get the image for a specific American Football manager in PNG format by providing the manager ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the manager whose image you want to retrieve.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/american-football/manager/793384/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/american-football/manager/{id}/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ManagerLastMatches
api_list.description: This operation retrieves the last matches for a given American Football manager ID. It returns a paginated list of events (matches), with the latest match first.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the manager whose last matches you want to retrieve.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: The zero-based index of the page of results to retrieve.

api_list.name: MatchStreaks
api_list.description: Get the win/loss streaks for the two teams involved in a specific American Football match.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the match for which you want to retrieve the win/loss streaks.

api_list.name: MatchSchedules
api_list.description: This operation returns the match schedules for the given date, including match timings, teams, and other relevant information.

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (e.g., 2022).

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: The day of the month for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (1-31).

required_parameters.name: month
required_parameters.description: The month for which you want to retrieve the match schedules (1-12).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/american-football/matches/31/7/2022"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/american-football/matches/{day}/{month}/{year}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: PlayerRegularSeasonStatistics
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves regular season statistics for a specific player in a given tournament and season.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the player whose regular season statistics are to be retrieved.

required_parameters.name: tournamentId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the unique tournament in which the player participated.

required_parameters.name: seasonId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the season in which the player participated.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/american-football/player/853680/tournament/9464/season/36422/statistics/regularSeason"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/american-football/player/{id}/tournament/{tournamentid}/season/{seasonid}/statistics/regularSeason"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "americanfootballapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: MatchBestPlayers
api_list.description: Get the best players for a specific American Football match by providing its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the match for which you want to get the best players.

api_list.code:
import requests
